Text:
Michael Ronson deserves major kudos for including such a thorough video tutorial on how to mount the disc image, get the game installed, and implement the "no cd" patch.

Unfortunately, when I attempted a full install, McAfee halted the process, due to a suspected Trojan! I was able to complete a minimal install, but the game did not respond in any way to keyboard controls or to my Logitech gamepad.

add it to the allow list, the trojan is the noCD fix because their homebrews and are unrecogonised file types, they not do any harm to your computer, delete the noCD folder after if your anti-virus still plays up
love this game!!!tnx 4 the up m8!!!
Alright mate, brilliant video, but when i click on the CCD file SRally, it comes up with the little mounting window but when it disappears nothing happens after that? Thanks for help in advance. Jake
